message: I understand you want a larger share, but this is a fair offer considering the inflation rate. Let's close the deal.
Considering inflation, this is a reasonable adjustment
Alice, we're running out of time. This offer is slightly better for me than your last, and it's the best you'll get at this point.
Time pressure is on both of us, meet me in the middle
Alice, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical outcome. Take it before inflation eats away at the value even further.
